articles.title: Nagorno-Karabakh: Ethnic Armenians leave amid cleansing fear - BBC
articles.description: Azerbaijan captured the area in a flash operation and says it wants to integrate its residents.
articles.content:
Hundreds of ethnic Armenians have fled to Armenia from Nagorno-Karabakh, days after the enclave was seized by Azerbaijan.
They entered shortly after local officials announced plans to move those mad… [+2918 chars]
